Hairbrush with a built-in scalp massager: This innovative hairbrush features multiple vibrating nodes on the bristles that not only detangle and smooth the hair but also provide a soothing massage to the scalp. The massager can be adjusted to different intensities to suit individual preferences.

Hairbrush with UV protection: This hairbrush is designed with a UV-absorbing coating that protects the hair from damage caused by excessive sun exposure. The coating also helps to maintain the hair's natural color and shine.

Hairbrush with a heating function: This hairbrush features a heating element that can be turned on to warm the bristles, providing a more efficient detangling and styling experience. The heat can also help to seal the cuticle of the hair, reducing frizz and flyaways.

Hairbrush with a built-in diffuser: This hairbrush has a built-in diffuser that helps to distribute heat evenly and prevent hot spots. The diffuser can be adjusted to different sizes to suit individual hair types and styling needs.

Hairbrush with a smart sensor: This high-tech hairbrush features a built-in sensor that detects the type of hair being brushed and adjusts the brushing motion accordingly. The sensor can also detect the amount of tangling or knots in the hair and provide real-time feedback to help users brush more efficiently.
